user_query: My company is expanding its product range and we are looking for new suppliers. Can you suggest some reliable stores on AliExpress that offer a wide range of products? It would be great if you could provide the product names, prices, order count, and website URLs. Also, find out the shipping details for one of the products with the ID 4000886597329. Additionally, could you recommend a trustworthy shipping company for international deliveries?

TaskList.description: Retrieve a list of reliable stores on AliExpress that offer a wide range of products.
Extract product names, prices, order counts, and website URLs from the list of stores retrieved in Step 1.
Look up shipping details for the product with ID 4000886597329.
Provide recommendations for trustworthy shipping companies for international deliveries.
